dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3883 IH: Muslim Brotherhood Is a Terrorist Organization Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Mace introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To require the Secretary of State to designate the Muslim Brotherhood as a foreign terrorist organization.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Muslim Brotherhood Is a Terrorist Organization Act of 2025.

section.header: Designation of the Muslim Brotherhood as a Foreign Terrorist Organization
section.text: The Secretary of State shall designate the Muslim Brotherhood as a foreign terrorist organization pursuant to section 219 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1189).
